message.body: That sucks but I'd rather get bad news sooner then later. Cindy is coming back again on Monday.
I want her back there a every couple days until either they bedbugs are gone or we give up & switch to a new exterminator.
Our dryer is broken just FYI
It dries barely and def isn't strong enough to kill bed bugs anymore
:/ sorry to tell you bad need
Also I was bitten 3 times last night :( bc our dryer doesn't dry all the way, and my blankets fell on floor but I couldn't high heat dry them :(
For now I can go across street to laundromat

But just FYI I've been drying my bed linens Every single night on high heat before sleeping (along w having bed totally isolated from walls and on coasters and nothing under it etc ) and that's the only reason i hadn't been bit all along
They're def all over my room
Like for the past two months, every single night, I take my entire comforter all pillows all sheets and put through dryer 40 min before going to bed
I'm def allergic to them so I'm a good 'tester' I guess lol
(Oh oops! I didn't see that you responded to my first alert concerning the dryer. Carry on...)
Sorry. I just spoke to the appliance guy who is great. He is was picking up his dad at the airport. He is going to call me back.
I'm a little afraid he might not want to come out b/c of the bedbugs. The plumber doesn't want to come back until they are gone.
I just texted everyone about the bed bugs. No one else has gotten bitten or seen a bed bug in a couple weeks. They really do like you. Beth said that happens. They like your blood type or something.

I'm am So So So Fucking sorry you are still getting bitten. So frustrated we can't get them out of your room. And as I'm sure you are wondering, I'm very much considering replacing Cindy. But obv don't say anything to her or Beth.
